entry.title: Combined summary - Icon licenses
entry.summary: In an email message, Luke informed someone that most of the icons with license issues in Bitcoin-Qt have been replaced. However, he intentionally did not replace the ones created by the recipient of the email, assuming that they would be willing to relicense them under the MIT or similar license. Luke asked the recipient to commit a license change for these icons before the 0.5.0 final version is released. It is unclear who the recipient of the email is and what their response was to Luke's request.
